review_text: Jada's Place Too was exactly as described by Jackie. The neighborhood is nice and quiet. I needed a quick getaway for one night, with my pups. We stopped by Hilsman Park on our way out of Albany. It was a nice place to take my pups on a walk, and not very far from the rental. The park is located in the Garden District which has older homes, sidewalks and the trees form a canopy over the road. I would definitely visit Jackie's rental again.
